thread.title: Independent Scotland would have to ditch pound and use the euro, says EU chief - The Sun
thread.title_full: Independent Scotland would have to ditch pound and use the euro, says EU chief - The Sun

title: Independent Scotland would have to ditch pound and use the euro, says EU chief - The Sun
text:
EU CAN'T HAVE IT BOTH WAYS Independent Scotland would have to ditch pound and use the euro, says EU chief 
European Commission's representative in the UK says if Scotland splits it would not automatically be a member and would have to wait in line like Serbia and Montenegro By STEVE HAWKES Deputy Political Editor 10th February 2017, 2:55 pm
